channel.title: Equipment for portals
channel.description:
Ok i want to make 1 thing if players Equipment is Anny bow in inv or equipment's the he couldn't go to a certain portal how do i add it ??? :)
IF u culd teach or give a code :) ty :))
OR how can i fix so when u atk wit a bow monster atk's back?

item.title: Equipment for portals
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

if(ObjectID == portalid))
{
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == bowid || playerHasItemAmount(bowid)) {
sendMessage("Your message");
} else {
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage("Your message");
}
}

Read full topic
